Bug fixed, UI improved;

1. New offer: Romwe Points, you can redeem the points when placing orders;
2. FAQ available, find the answer to your questions more easily;
3. More new functions and improvements to explore!

1.You can place your order with the recommended coupons now, which directly reduce the amount of payment;
2.Other small changes;

1. It is easy to see if items in your order can be returned/exchanged;
2. Point details are now accessible. You will receive detailed information on how many points you earned and how many points you redeemed.

1. India users can now place orders with COD service;
2. Improved the sorting order of most popular products, allowing easier access to find the items you like;

1. Advanced UI design for Category page, allowing easier access to find the clothes you want;
2. Other UI improvements and some bugs fixed;

ROMWE'S free customized gifts with any purchases.
Black Friday Lucky Draw, amazing prizes to be won!
Improve size description in product page, find your size easier

1. Christmas is coming and ROMWE will bring you a Christmas-featured shopping experience.
2. The ordering process was optimized so that you may shop smoothly.
3. Spell check for searching is available. You may find what you want even when there is a misspelling.
Bug fixed, UI improved;

1.Indian customers may pay via PayU now;
2.Taxation in some countries and regions is adjusted in accordance with government policy;
3.When the order reaches a certain amount, Saudi Arabian customers need to complete personal information to receive the parcel in time.

1 Brand new special Valentine's Day visual experience
2 A more appealing Login page
3 Address optimization
1. Bug fixed, UI improved;

This a must-have update:
1. Romdeals fully upgraded into lightning deals with even more offers for you;
2. COD service has been optimized for customers in the Middle East;
3. Optimized express shipping services for some regions.

1. It is easy to see if items in your order can be returned/exchanged;
2. Point details are now accessible. You will receive detailed information on how many points you earned and how many points you redeemed.

1.Homepage was upgraded. Now it is easier to find what you want!
2.You have easy access to Lightning Deals with even more offers!
3.Shopping Cart will be displayed on every page. You may add an item into your Shopping Cart at any time, anywhere!
Some bug fixes.
Some bug fixes.

1. A new way to log in using Google, which makes it easier to sign in
2. The delivery information has been added to the product page, and the delivery time is now easier to access
3. List view switching is now more convenient

1 Daily new page supports filtering products by category, and will be more convenient to shop
2 Optimize logistics trajectory to view your package anytime, anywhere
3 The shopping cart removes automatic selection of free gifts, optimize the process of receiving free gifts.

We have prepared a small surprise for you in the new version.
1 The first time you start APP, you can choose your shopping preferences and only see the parts you are interested in.
2 The checkout page supports browsing products, double checking your order so you'll never buy anything wrong.
3 When you place an order, you can directly add those products that you don't want to pay immediately into the wishlists. Ask me what I like, first look at my wishlists!

The following updates have been made with ROMWE for your convenience.
1. Product detail pages have been updated for a more user-friendly shopping experience.
2. Details on the order page, and billing addresses can now be modified, in cases where the address is entered incorrectly. 3. Background details and interfaces have been upgraded.

What's new:
1. New promotions added for more savings
2. On site tracking
3. Other improvements

Here is the latest ROMWE app!
1. Payment details have been upgraded, making the price and discounts clear;
2. More promotions added, bringing you more fun and saving you more;
3. Indian customers may pay with paytm now.

1. Black Friday is fast approaching! Great deals, styling photos, and a pleasant shopping experience awaits you!
2. You may now check your order updates in Notification
3. New payment methods have been added for a more convenient ordering process.
